灌.definition: to irrigate; to pour; to install (software); to record (music)

灌南.definition: Guannan county in Lianyungang 連雲港|连云港[Lian2 yun2 gang3], Jiangsu

灌南縣.definition: Guannan county in Lianyungang 連雲港|连云港[Lian2 yun2 gang3], Jiangsu

灌水.definition: to irrigate; to pour water into; to inject water into meat to increase its weight (plumping); to cook the books; to post low-value messages (small talk etc) on Internet forums

灌注.definition: to pour into; perfusion (med.); to concentrate one's attention on; to teach; to inculcate; to instill

灌漿.definition: grouting; (of grain) to be in the milk; to form a vesicle (medicine)

灌米湯.definition: to flatter; to butter sb up

灌輸.definition: to imbue with; to inculcate; to instill into; to teach; to impart; to channel water to another place

灌迷魂湯.definition: to butter sb up; to try to impress sb

灌酒.definition: to force sb to drink alcohol

灌醉.definition: to fuddle; to befuddle; to inebriate; to get someone drunk

灌鉛.definition: to weight sth with lead; (of a die) loaded; to pour molten lead into the mouth (as a punishment)

灌陽.definition: Guanyang county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

灌陽縣.definition: Guanyang county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

灌雲.definition: Guanyun county in Lianyungang 連雲港|连云港[Lian2 yun2 gang3], Jiangsu

灌雲縣.definition: Guanyun county in Lianyungang 連雲港|连云港[Lian2 yun2 gang3], Jiangsu
